Name: Orbatron
About the game: Orbatron is an exciting game that will test your reflexes, focus, and spatial reasoning. Collect orbs, chain combos, and develop strategies to master each unique level. Action-packed, challenging gameplay Five main gameplay modes - Cluster , Flight , Monolith , Special , and Endless Find Hidden Orbs to unlock Special Levels with unique gameplay mechanics Gorgeous surreal & eclectic environments Approachable for players of all ages and skill levels, yet highly challenging and competitive 99 Unique and challenging levels Leaderboards and Achievements Expansive soundtrack Extremely fast load times Currently Rated 4.9/5.0 in the Oculus Store

Meta Description: Looking for information on Orbatron? Check out the release date (Mar 1, 2021), developer insights from Tobias Miller, and a complete game summary.
